sections.title: Overview
sections.content: MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator that's geared towards building project documentation.

sections.title: Host anywhere
sections.content: MkDocs builds completely static HTML sites that you can host on GitHub pages, Amazon S3, or anywhere else you choose.

sections.title: Great themes available
sections.content: There's a stack of good looking themes available for MkDocs.

sections.title: Install with a Package Manager
sections.content: If your package manager does not have a recent "MkDocs" package, you can still use your package manager to install "Python" and "pip". $ python --version Python 3.8.2 $ pip --version pip 20.0.2 from /usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pip (python 3.8) Note If you would like manpages installed for MkDocs, the click-man tool can generate and install them for you. Simply run the following two commands: pip install click-man click-man --target path/to/man/pages mkdocs

sections.title: Configuration
sections.content: Guide to all available configuration settings.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Project settings are always configured by using a YAML configuration file in the project directory named mkdocs.yml. As a minimum this configuration file must contain the site_name setting. All other settings are optional.

sections.title: site_description
sections.content: Set the site description. This will add a meta tag to the generated HTML header. default: null

sections.title: site_author
sections.content: Set the name of the author. This will add a meta tag to the generated HTML header.

sections.title: use_directory_urls
sections.content: This setting controls the style used for linking to pages within the documentation. Source file use_directory_urls: true use_directory_urls: false index.md / /index.html api-guide.md /api-guide/ /api-guide.html about/license.md /about/license/ /about/license.html

sections.title: lang
sections.content: A list of languages to use when building the search index as identified by their ISO 639-1 language codes. ar: Arabic da: Danish nl: Dutch en: English fi: Finnish fr: French de: German hu: Hungarian it: Italian ja: Japanese no: Norwegian pt: Portuguese ro: Romanian ru: Russian es: Spanish sv: Swedish th: Thai tr: Turkish vi: Vietnamese

title: No title - Read the Docs MkDocs Test

sections.title: No title - Read the Docs MkDocs Test
sections.content: This file doesn't have a header, but it does have a content. 1 2 3 Another paragraph

sections.title: I'm the header
sections.content: I don't start with a header.
